org.hibernate.validator.cfg.context

接口 ConstraintDefinitionTarget

  • 所有已知子接口:
    ConstraintDefinitionContext<A>, ConstraintMappingTarget, ContainerElementConstraintMappingContext, CrossParameterConstraintMappingContext, ParameterConstraintMappingContext, PropertyConstraintMappingContext, ReturnValueConstraintMappingContext, TypeConstraintMappingContext<C>
    所有已知实现类:
    ContainerElementConstraintMappingContextImpl, TypeConstraintMappingContextImpl

    public interface ConstraintDefinitionTarget
    Facet of a constraint definition creational context which allows to the select the constraint (annotation type) to which the next operations shall apply.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      <A extends Annotation>
      ConstraintDefinitionContext<A>      		 constraintDefinition(Class<A> annotationType)
      Selects the constraint (i.e. annotation type) to which the next operations shall apply.

    • 方法详细资料

      • constraintDefinition

        <A extends Annotation> ConstraintDefinitionContext<A> constraintDefinition(Class<A> annotationType)
        Selects the constraint (i.e. annotation type) to which the next operations shall apply. A given constraint may only be configured once.
        类型参数:
        A - The annotation type to select.
        参数:
        annotationType - The annotation type to select. This type must be an @interface annotated with javax.validation.Constraint.
        返回:
        A creational context representing the selected constraint.
